name: Imperialism: Fate of India
description: This strategy will take you back to the year 1805, where you'll take control of one of the Indian princely states, in order to liberate India from the British invaders, annex the rest of the countries and unite the subcontinent under your command.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7(x64) Processor: 2GHz Dual-core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 1Gb DirectX 9.0c compatible DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space
